en.hero_sub: Be first to experience PNTA: curated bars, real-time vibes, and instant access. Join the list—your night just leveled up.
en.features_sub: Designed for the night: curated discovery, live energy, and doors that open for you.
en.f1_d: Discover trending spots and hidden gems—handpicked for the PNTA crowd.
en.f2_d: See the scene in real time and coordinate effortlessly.
en.f3_d: Instant lists, VIP access, and reservations at partner venues with a tap.
en.f4_d: Early invites to tastings, launches, and limited-capacity nights across the city.
en.step1_d: Lock your spot. We'll notify you when PNTA opens in your city.
en.step2_d: Reserve your unique PNTA ID and tailor your vibe.
en.step3_d: Discover bars, see who's out, and glide past the queue.
en.banner_p: Enter your email to claim early access. We'll let you know the moment PNTA opens in your city.

qa.a: We are rolling out city by city. Join the waitlist for your city’s date.
iOS and Android at launch. Web companion later.
Early access is invite-only. Joining the waitlist increases your chances.
We collect the minimum data necessary and never sell your info. You control visibility.

business.hero_title: Fill your rooms with the right crowd, right now
business.hero_subtitle: PNTA connects high-intent guests to leading venues with live demand signals, loyalty insights, and seamless door management.
business.hero_card_subtitle: Purpose-built tooling for busy nightlife teams

hero_card_metric.title: +28% uplift in repeat visits
hero_card_metric.description: Partners see measurable growth within the first 60 days.

hero_card_customers.title: Who we partner with
hero_card_customers.description: Premium cocktail bars, music-led venues, speakeasies, and members clubs across Europe.

business.highlights_heading: A modern partnership for forward-thinking venues
business.highlights_subheading: Unlock real-time demand, elevated guest experiences, and smarter operations through one partner program.

highlights.title: Predictable, high-value traffic
highlights.description: Tap into curated members who match your concept and spend profile with guaranteed minimums on key nights.

highlights.title: Live demand signals
highlights.description: See who is inbound, forecast covers, and adjust staffing with confidence using our live dashboard.

highlights.title: Direct guest communication
highlights.description: Send offers, manage guest lists, and confirm tables instantly through one streamlined channel.

business.how_heading: Onboard, go live, and measure impact in weeks
business.how_subheading: We act as an extension of your host team so you can focus on hospitality while we drive the right demand.

steps.title: Design your ideal guest profile
steps.description: Align on target demographics, visit cadence, and KPIs with our partnership strategist.

steps.title: Launch PNTA experiences
steps.description: Integrate the PNTA Venue OS at the door and sync with your reservations or POS stack.

steps.title: Review performance together
steps.description: Access detailed revenue insights and monthly strategy sessions to keep results compounding.

business.testimonials_subheading: Hospitality leaders across Europe rely on PNTA to bring in the right guests and actionable insights every night.

testimonials.name: Sofia L.
testimonials.quote: PNTA delivers guests who get our concept. Our team now spends time hosting instead of vetting lists.

testimonials.name: Marco D.
testimonials.quote: Within a month, Thursdays became our strongest night thanks to PNTA's demand data and outreach.

testimonials.name: Helena V.
testimonials.quote: The partnership feels collaborative. We iterate on programming together and see immediate uplift.

business.cta_heading: Let’s map out your PNTA partnership
business.cta_subheading: Share your details and our partnerships team will craft a tailored rollout plan for your venue.
business.cta_disclaimer: We respond within two business days. Access is currently limited to select cities.

da.hero_sub: Vær først til at prøve PNTA: kuraterede barer, live stemning og instant adgang. Tilmeld ventelisten — din aften er opgraderet.
da.features_sub: Skabt til natten: kurateret discovery, live energi og døre der åbner for dig.
da.f1_d: Find hot spots og skjulte perler—udvalgt til PNTA-publikummet.
da.f2_d: Se scenen i realtid og koordiner nemt.
da.f3_d: Instant lists, VIP-adgang og reservationer hos partnere med et tap.
da.f4_d: Tidlige invitationer til smagninger, launches og events med begrænset kapacitet.
da.step1_d: Sikr din plads. Vi giver besked når PNTA åbner i din by.
da.step2_d: Reserver dit unikke PNTA-ID og finjuster din vibe.
da.step3_d: Opdag barer, se hvem der er ude, og glid forbi køen.
da.banner_p: Indtast din e-mail for tidlig adgang. Vi skriver så snart PNTA åbner i din by.

qa.a: Vi ruller ud by for by. Tilmeld ventelisten for datoen i din by.
iOS og Android ved lancering. Web senere.
Tidlig adgang er invite-only. Tilmelding øger chancen.
Vi indsamler kun det nødvendige og sælger aldrig dine data. Du styrer synligheden.

business.hero_title: Fyld huset med de rigtige gæster – i realtid
business.hero_subtitle: PNTA forbinder kvalitetsgæster med førende venues via live efterspørgselsdata, loyalitetsindsigter og smidig dørstyring.

business.how_subheading: Vi fungerer som en forlængelse af jeres host-team, så I kan fokusere på værtskab mens vi driver den rette efterspørgsel.

business.testimonials_subheading: Hospitality-ledere i hele Europa stoler på PNTA for at få de rigtige gæster og brugbar indsigt hver aften.

testimonials.name: Sofia L.
testimonials.quote: PNTA sender gæster der forstår vores univers. Teamet kan fokusere på værtskab fremfor screening.

testimonials.name: Marco D.
testimonials.quote: Efter en måned var torsdage vores stærkeste aften takket være PNTAs efterspørgselsdata og outreach.

testimonials.name: Helena V.
testimonials.quote: Samarbejdet er reelt. Vi udvikler programmeringen sammen og ser straks effekt.

business.cta_subheading: Del jeres detaljer, så udarbejder vores partnerteam en rollout-plan tilpasset jeres venue.
business.cta_disclaimer: Vi vender tilbage inden for to hverdage. Adgang er lige nu begrænset til udvalgte byer.
